entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Roblin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Roblin 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -23.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -27.8°C
Wind: WSW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
